mapper.select: select *, ( ( select decideCnt from corona_info where date_format(stateTime , '%Y-%m-%d') = str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') limit 1 ) - ( select decideCnt from corona_info where date_format(stateTime, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_sub(str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day) limit 1 ) ) as diff from corona_info where date_format(stateTime , '%Y-%m-%d') = str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') limit 1
select * from corona_vaccine where sido like #{region} and date_format(regDt , '%Y-%m-%d') = str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') limit 1

select gubun from ( select (AVG(confCaseRate) + AVG(deathRate)) / 2 as danger, gubun from corona_age where gubun != '남성' and gubun != '여성'
and date_format(createDt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
group by gubun order by danger desc limit 1 ) a

select date_format(createDt , "%Y-%m-%d") as date, defCnt from corona_sido where gubun=#{region} and
date_format(createDt , "%Y-%m-%d") <= str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d") and date_format(createDt , "%Y-%m-%d") > date_sub(str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 14 day) order by createDt asc

select date_sub(date_format(regDt, "%Y-%m-%d"), interval 1 day) date, accFirstCnt, accSecondCnt from corona_vaccine where sido like #{region} and
date_format(regDt, "%Y-%m-%d") <= str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d") and date_format(regDt, "%Y-%m-%d") > date_sub(str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 14 day) order by regDt asc

select date_sub(date_format(regDt, "%Y-%m-%d"), interval 1 day) date, accFirstCnt, accSecondCnt, firstCnt, secondCnt, sido from corona_vaccine where date_format(regDt, "%Y-%m-%d") = str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d") order by accFirstCnt desc
